name: Dormant Curio
description: Everyone has an idea, but no one has a clue.

abilities.name: Hidden Potential
abilities.description: Neutral items crafted while holding the Dormant Curio have their potency increased considerably.
notes: Directly buffs the next neutral item's ability stats
The effect is provided by the Unleashed Enchantment that is built in to this artifact
Techies' Spoon's Stash facet does not keep this enchantment

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
